definition: Undecaprenyl phosphate alpha-L-Ara4N + 2,3,2'3'-Tetrakis(3-hydroxytetradecanoyl)-D-glucosaminyl-1,6-beta-D-glucosamine 1,4'-bisphosphate <=> Lipid IIA + di-trans,poly-cis-Undecaprenyl phosphate
